item.title: Improving performance insights using Apdex
item.description: Scenario Ever heard users complain about the sluggishness of your Power Automate flow? But how do we know if that complaint is based on actual performance or just a feeling? In this blog, weâ€™ll explore how to move from subjective complaints to objective insights by using Apdex scores to evaluate Power Automate flow performance. What is Apdex and how does it help in measuring flow performance? Apdex Overview Apdex (Application Performance Index) is a standardized way of measuring user satisfaction with application performance.
